channel.title: 2 Questions
channel.description:
Ok, I am using Gangscape v2 first of all. I moved my starting location and I want to make it so that some money appears on the ground close by. I already went into drops.cfg and put in
[code]drop = 995(tab)[Xcoord](tab)[Ycoord](tab)5000000(tab)0(tab)2(tab)Coins[/code]
What do I have to do to make my coins show up?
[b][size=10pt]ALSO[/size][/b]
I need to know how to change where you re-spawn after you die. If someone can help me with these questions, it would be greatly appreciated, thanks.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 08, 2007, 06:18:05 PM[/size][hr]Anyone?

item.title: 2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @Nyghtmares Nyghtmares
item.description:
@Nyghtmares wrote:

Yeah i figured that out, and i said yikes cause i didnt know what i was doing. Why’d you thank me? i thank you… lol[br][size=1]Posted on: June 08, 2007, 07:05:57 PM[/size][hr]an answer to the second question would help alot, thank you…

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @_3D_PK3R ~3D PK3R~
item.description:
@_3D_PK3R wrote:

Nyghtmares:

yikes…

yikes…
dont spam.

 ItemHandler.addItem(995, Xcoords, Ycoords, 500000000, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // coins ftw

add that into itemspawnpoints
change x and y ccoords to you x and y coorrds
Thanks.
~3d

Read full topic

Your messed up kid :z
additem.itemglobal blah blah blah.
